actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to provide for the designation of the Smithsonian Institution's National Collection of Fine Arts and the National Museum of History and Technology as the National Museum of American Art and the National Museum of American History, respectively.

summary.text: Designates: (1) the Smithsonian Institution's National Collection of Fine Arts as the National Museum of American Art; and (2) the Museum of History and Technology as the National Museum of American History.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the designation of the Smithsonian Institution's National Collection of Fine Arts and the National Museum of History and Technology as the National Museum of American Art and the National Museum of American History, respectively.
